display.name: Prosperous
display.description: Completing this vault guarantees an Artifact!
display.descriptionFormatted: Completing this vault guarantees an artifact!

display.name: Cake Artifact
display.description: Every stack increases the artifact chance by 0.5%
display.descriptionFormatted: Every stack increases the artifact chance by 0.5%

display.name: Plunder Artifact
display.description: Lowers the artifact chance of this vault by 10%
display.descriptionFormatted: Lowers the artifact chance of this vault by 10%

display.name: Purified
display.description: This Crystal had a Curse removed using a Mote of Purity.

display.name: Sanctified
display.description: This Crystal had all curses removed using a Mote of Sanctity.

display.name: Clarified
display.description: This Crystal had all curses revealed using a Mote of Clarity.

display.descriptionFormatted: Mobs in this vault will always hit critical strikes

display.descriptionFormatted: Players in this vault no longer regenerate mana

display.description: Players move faster in this vault! (+2 Speed)
display.descriptionFormatted: Players move faster in this vault! (+2 Speed)

display.name: Afterlife
display.description: You will gain 50% less experience in this vault, but if you die you will keep your inventory and receive a durability penalty.

display.name: Phoenix
display.description: If killed in a vault you will be revived instantly and the Phoenix modifier will fizzle

display.name: Beginner's Grace
display.description: If killed in the vault you will keep your inventory but receive a durability penalty.

display.name: Casual Mode
display.description: If killed in the vault you will keep your inventory but receive a durability penalty.

display.name: Locked
display.description: This vault can not be exited without completing it.

display.name: Clumsy
display.description: -50% Trap Disarm & Increases traps while below 0%

display.descriptionFormatted: Healing is more efficient! (+%d%% Healing Effectiveness)

display.name: Idona's Favour
display.description: Players deal more ability damage in this vault

display.name: Bingo!
display.description: Every BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and boosts soul chance by 25%

display.name: Bingo!
display.description: Every subsequent BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and boosts soul chance by 25%, and boosts your crate tier by 1!

display.name: Loot Goblin
display.description: Doubles all loot and triples its rarity!

display.name: Door Hunter
display.description: Reveals all doors inside the vault!

display.name: Herald's Grace
display.description: Dying in this vault does not cause you any item loss, and this vault is of course locked.

display.name: Potion Curse
display.description: You drank a vanilla potion, this has upset the gods, chests have lost contents, and a minute has been removed from the vault

display.name: Companion's Challenge
display.description: Increases mob damage, mob health and mob spawns by 10% per stack, increases mob speed by 1.5% per stack

display.name: Collapsing
display.description: This vault is cursed, it's collapsing, has less time, and wild mobs will appear

display.name: Cursed!
display.description: This vault is cursed, it's collapsing, void pools have appeared, some mobs are immortal & their attacks seem to have hexing effects on you!

display.name: Void Pools
display.description: This vault is cursed, void pools have spawned, wild mobs appears and the vault seems to not populate correctly.

display.name: Explosive
display.description: This vault is cursed, there are random explosions, wild mobs appears and the vault seems to not populate correctly.

display.name: Freezing Mobs
display.description: This vault is cursed, mobs freeze you when attacking, wild mobs appears and the vault seems to not populate correctly.

display.name: Wrecked Vault
display.description: This vault is cursed, mobs freeze you when attacking, it has less time, and wild mobs will appear

display.name: Focused Mobs
display.description: +15% Mob Crit Chance and +20% Mob Damage

display.name: Cake Layer
display.description: Increases mob damage, mob speed, soul shards, all chest spawns, coins, the amount of items in the crake and the chance of getting an artifact

display.name: Flame
display.description: Your streak of this ascension, each stack increases the difficulty of the objective.

display.name: Plunderer
display.description: This vault yields no experience, and has a lower chance of finding an artifact, but has 10% more loot and slightly more ores

display.name: Ethereal
display.description: Mobs in this vault can spawn in as ethereal, being immune to any damage.

display.name: Curse Ethereal
display.description: Mobs in this vault can spawn in as ethereal, being immune to any damage.

display.description: Mobs in this vault do not drop soul shards

display.description: Taking damage in this vault removes hearts instead of emptying them.
